lines.text: I do not do animal acts. I do not do S&M or any variations of that particular bent, no water sports either. I will not shave my pussy, no fistfucking and absolutely no coming in my face. I get $2000 a day and I do not work without a contract.
Makes me hot too, real hot. Come on over here and I'll show you how hot. Okay, take off your clothes, I wanna take some pictures.
Okay. What is it that we're watching?
I don't know. What are you, some kind of method actor?
Carol lying there. Her face was glowing.
How do you do that? How do you get a girl's face to glow? I got sixteen years of good humping, not once did I even get a glimmer, let alone a fucking glow! Glowing?
I thought you were a bartender, not a priest.
Then keep the fucking glass filled!
Kicked the bitch out, I hope.
I'm not just a stunt cock, I'm an ACTOR!
I'd buy THAT for a dollar!
[following his humiliation in the acting class]

C'mon, Jake, you're too hard on yourself. These guys, they can't get a job, they put an ad in the trades, they call themselves teachers. What do they teach us? How to be more fucked up than we already are!
When rich wives get dead I usually go after the husbands.
